title: Favorite music when playing your main?
body:
For me it depends. If I am using Shyvana's spacer skin:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tI-zhwCaY74&list=PLDCAAC5F4BC6DF92C
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KyFe5m2MU9Q
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DWoudbndXbw
Or anything like Anne Nikitin's music for space documentaries, Star Trek New Worlds soundtrack.

Using any other Shyvana skin?
Meme music like JonTron/GameGrumps.
https://youtu.be/K4m5mr41g4c
Sonic music if building movespeed.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9RFWNpw2cbM

Honorable mention Teemo music
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rnDmdd-RJZ4

How about you?

{{champion:27}} : Benny Hill  :^)

{{champion:223}} : You got a friend in me

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S9MN2WeqFY8 -- "Leck mich im Arsch" (literally "Lick me in the arse") is a canon in B-flat major composed by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, K. 231 (K. 382c), with lyrics in German. It was one of a set of at least six canons probably written in Vienna in 1782.[1] Sung by six voices as a three-part round, it is thought to be a party piece for his friends.
-- You decide, it fits several pretty nicely... That and I will jump on any chance I get to post that.
{{champion:136}} "Like a shooting star" - Must I say more? :^)
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qF4RCOcz9ow
Hardstyle EDM. Its nice when I get to the point where I am autoattacking just as fast as the beat.
I just listen to train noise compilations while playing Sion

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3V44eAe4uJQ

{{champion:17}}

Teemo carry?

{{champion:78}} Oh please, most Teemos care even less about objectives than ADCs do.

> [{quoted}](name=AbsorbantTNT,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jmEWV5Oj,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-10-24T02:23:53.110+0000)
>
> Teemo carry?
> 
> {{champion:78}} Oh please, most Teemos care even less about objectives than ADCs do.

??? I must be a weird case because I main botlane and care very much about falling towers... 

Epically as Tristana.

The song, it said "Teemo Carry" at one point. That I find stupid because over half the Teemos you see play him only because they hear he's annoying and are 12-year-old trolls who revel in other's suffering. They also grab ignite just for KS rather than Teleport for map pressure. They often go botlane "support" and don't even build so much as a pink ward for support items and focus on starving the ADC from both farm and kills. And regardless of how many kills they nab, they don't do much at all to objectives. Frankly, it's kind of sad how that's always expected of Teemo and hardly anything's changing that.

Also, I was trying to include a Teemo icon, but put in a Poppy one instead. Now that you quoted my comment, I see no point in editing it.

> [{quoted}](name=AbsorbantTNT,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jmEWV5Oj,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-24T09:53:34.215+0000)
>
> The song, it said "Teemo Carry" at one point. That I find stupid because over half the Teemos you see play him only because they hear he's annoying and are 12-year-old trolls who revel in other's suffering. They also grab ignite just for KS rather than Teleport for map pressure. 

Lol now you're just generalizing all Teemo player's into a Stereotype. 

This is supposed to be a fun boards about what song we feel like when playing our mains. Not find the person we disagree with the most and begin to nit-pick. 

Don't be an ignorant a-hole to people on "Just for fun" boards in MEMES AND GAMES.
_________________________

I'm done with you, don't bother, I'm not replying to what you say next. I probably won't even read it. Not worth time to argue with people on an online board that no one cares about.

Lol, now you're just assuming I said "all" when I said "over half". I've met a nice Yasuo, a nice Riven, and (discounting JayHog1992 because I've only met him on the boards) a nice Teemo, so I don't span assumptions over an entire champion.

Stop being so easily _triggered_ because I had no intentions on doing that.
